title: Bone Block
summaries: Bone Blocks are blocks that are placed by the Bone Wand at the cost of 1 Bone per block.

In <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, mining them will drop Bones. There is no way to obtain the block as an item as of 1.4.

In <linked>[img:Legacy tModLoader version]</linked><linked> Legacy tModLoader version</linked>, mining them will drop the Bone Block as an item. There is no way to convert them back into regular Bones. The block item cannot be used to craft <linked>Bone Block Walls</linked> or <linked>Bone furniture</linked>, which are instead made from raw Bones themselves, at a <linked>Bone Welder</linked>.
